attributes.action:
No to delay in local elections.
We demand local elections are held has normal.
attributes.background:
The hugely successful petition calling for a General Election demonstrated a dissatisfaction and need for change.
We believe any delay in local elections is a ploy by this government to deny our voice, our rights, and strongly resist this implementation.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Do not postpone the local elections
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/710155
